problem_text_cn: 在△MNB中,BN=6,点A,C,D分别在MB,NB,MN上,四边形ABCD为平行四边形,且∠NDC=∠MDA,则四边形ABCD的周长是()
problem_text_en: In △MNB, BN = N_0, points A, C, and D are respectively on MB, NB, MN, quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, and ∠NDC = ∠MDA, then the perimeter of quadrilateral ABCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:在平行四边形ABCD中CD∥AB,AD∥BC,∴∠M=∠NDC,∠N=∠MDA,∵∠NDC=∠MDA,∴∠M=∠N=∠NDC=∠MDA,∴MB=BN=6,CD=CN,AD=MA,∴四边形ABCD的周长=AB+BC+CD+AD=MA+AB+BC+CN=MB+BN=2BN=12．故选:D．
